name: S for Squad
description:
Hello =D

S for Squad is a 2D game made in 72h for the Ludum Dare 46. The theme was "Keep it alive".

Your objective is to rescue all the hostages on a level and get them to the helicopter safely.

Controls

-> Move the character with arrow keys or WASD/ZQSD

-> Press escape to change the music volume

Actions

-> Change target

-> Shoot the selected enemy

-> Heal the player

-> Prevent the hostage from taking damage

Team

-> Asue : game developer

-> Emperor Of Paradox : graphics

-> Oxalotte : composed all the musics, level-design
